amendment.description: To require quarterly reports on the status of the efforts of the Iraq Survey Group to account for the Iraq weapons of mass destruction programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1866 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1866 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S12655; text: CR S12655) To require quarterly reports on the status of the efforts of the Iraq Survey Group to account for the Iraq weapons of mass destruction programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1866 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1866 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Durbin.
